Frequently Asked Questions

What exactly is web scraping?

Web scraping is the art of using software to extract data from websites. In other words, it’s a technique to turn unstructured data from websites into a structured, ready to use databases. This technology is flexible, powerful, and mistake-less compared to manual copy/paste.

How long does a web scraping job typically take?

It normally takes us 1-3 days to complete a web scraping job, depending on the target website and your requirement. Some just take 1 day, but the others may need 1 week.

What payment methods do you accept?

We prefer PayPal. However you can also pay via credit cards or wire transfer.

What is your payment policy?

We’ll ask for 50% upfront payment before starting the work. The remaining balance will be due after the job is completed and you’re completely satisfied with the results.

What is the ExactData Guarantee?

For any reason we cannot complete the job requested, ExactData will refund you 100%. It’s completely risk free working with us!

Our Story

We started off web scraping career on Upwork, since 2008. After years of sucess there, we started ExactData.io to serve clients easier, focusing on accurate data and flexible solutions.
